summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Genesee Street, from Rainier Avenue to 42nd Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7557 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds". .
